## Description
The Small Areothermal Well is an geothermal energy production system&#10;that captures the trapped underground heat for the power grid.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Category:|Power|
|Construction:|PRE_FABRICATED|
|Size:|5.0 x 10.0 m|
|Level:|0|
|Maintenance Period:|150|
|Power Demands:|0.05 kW|
|Offline Power Demands:|0.005 kW|
|Construction:|[Small Areothermal Well](/docs/definitions/construction/small-areothermal-well)|

## Functions
      
- POWER_GENERATION
- POWER_STORAGE
